name: Video Schema
author: Muhammad Rizwan

sections.installation:
Through Dashboard

  1. Go to Plugins -> Add New -> Search for “Video Schema” Or Upload the plugins zip file

Through FTP

  1. Upload the plugin into wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. That’s It.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Through Dashboard

  1. Go to Plugins -> Add New -> Search for “Video Schema” Or Upload the plugins zip file

Through FTP

  1. Upload the plugin into wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. That’s It.

What is a Video Schema / Rich Snippet?

It is fundamentally a short outline of your page in the query items of Google, Yahoo, Bing and Automatically Show you thumbnail in google output.

How does a Video Schema help?

  • It gives web crawlers just the imperative and exact data to show in query output scraps.

  • Rich Snippets are extremely intuitive (photographs, star evaluations, value, creator, and so forth.) to give you a chance to emerge from rivalry

  • Helps Facebook show appropriate data when clients share your connections on Facebook
sections.description:
What is a Video Schema?

Video Rich Snippet Generator for schema.org Markup. Microdata can help searchengines better understand the content on your website With This Plugin.
A few notes about the sections above:

Supported Content Types –

This plugin supports the following types of Schemas:
* Video
